hypothesis_content.title: Neutral Regime Compression Breakout Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades within a 10-day Bollinger Band width percentile < 25% (compression) during a NEUTRAL regime, a subsequent 4-hour close outside the bands triggers a momentum move in the breakout direction that persists for 48+ hours with >70% directional consistency.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often exhibit compression before directional resolution. Low volatility during uncertainty represents pent-up energy. Breakouts on elevated volume signal institutional participation in new direction.
entry_conditions: 4-hour candle closes above BB upper band OR below BB lower band

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7% move from entry in breakout direction
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Breakout candle low (for long) or high (for short) invalidated

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: >50% of signals reverse to fill gap between breakout price and opposite band within 24 hours, or show <55% directional consistency over 48 hours.
